name: I Can't Believe He's Gone
Lore: 'Even though Luke felt the pain of losing his mentor, Obi-Wan continued to give him strength and guidance through the Force.',
Text: 'If Obi-Wan was just placed out of play, use 1 Force to deploy Immediate Effect on table. If a battle was just initiated at a site, may use 1 Force to increase your total power by 5. (Immune to Control.)',
